dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, like, he's just finished? What even was it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, like, he's just finished? What even was it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, um, President Tokayev, he just wrapped up his official visit to Uzbekistan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, um, President Tokayev, he just wrapped up his official visit to Uzbekistan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has concluded his official visit to Uzbekistan, according to a statement from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, Tokayev. From, uh, Kazakhstan, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, Tokayev. From, uh, Kazakhstan, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan has completed his participation in the Central Asia”European Union summit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He was there for the Central Asia-EU summit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. He was there for the Central Asia-E U summit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev arrived in Uzbekistan on Thursday to attend the Central Asia”European Union summit...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: The EU summit? In Uzbekistan? That's, like, kinda unexpected.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The E U summit? In Uzbekistan? That's, like, kinda unexpected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it was the Central Asia-EU summit. And an international conference, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it was the Central Asia-E U summit. And an international conference, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev arrived in Uzbekistan on Thursday to attend the Central Asia”European Union summit and the international conference "Central Asia in the Face of Global Climate Threats."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: On, uh, "Central Asia in the Face of Global Climate Threats."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: On, uh, Central Asia in the Face of Global Climate Threats.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and the international conference "Central Asia in the Face of Global Climate Threats."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, okay. So, like, busy trip then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, okay. So, like, busy trip then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Very busy. Akorda, the, uh, statement from his office said Prime Minister Aripov saw him off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Very busy. Akorda, the, uh, statement from his office said Prime Minister Aripov saw him off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has concluded his official visit to Uzbekistan, according to a statement from Akorda. ... At Samarkand Airport, he was seen off by Uzbekistan™s Prime Minister Abdulla Aripov," the statement read.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Aripov... that's the Uzbekistan Prime Minister?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Aripov... that's the Uzbekistan Prime Minister?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At Samarkand Airport, he was seen off by Uzbekistan™s Prime Minister Abdulla Aripov," the statement read.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, at Samarkand Airport. He arrived on Thursday, remember.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, at Samarkand Airport. He arrived on Thursday, remember.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At Samarkand Airport, he was seen off by Uzbekistan™s Prime Minister Abdulla Aripov," the statement read. ... Tokayev arrived in Uzbekistan on Thursday...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Thursday. So, like, a quick but packed visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Thursday. So, like, a quick but packed visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Getting a lot done, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Getting a lot done, you know?
